PositionHistory.Title: Lead/Application Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Project: CDAP Config Tool Role: Lead/Application Developer
Description: Bloomberg service is a global 24-hour-a-day financial information network providing real-time and historical pricing, indicative and fundamental data and analytics. The data collected from the data providers are send to the backend ticker plant after being processed by the parsers. The team is involved in the development of index file generator and search index algorithms for CDAP parser. These are used for enhancing the search options in the pkt-view tool. Currently working in CDAP Parser configuration management tool.
CDAP is the Three Tier Architecture: * GUI Layer. * Web Service Layer * Database Layer ; * CDAP tool is used to maintain the application configuration files and setup and deploy the configuration files.
Responsibilities: * Creation of XML files based on a given Schema (XSD) ; * Editing the Xml Files in Html format using jQuery ; * Developed and Consumed Web Services in Axix2 Server ; * Implementation of Ajax Calls to Server using DWR To develop a web based tool so that the XML data can be edited and updated through html using XPATH * Integrated jQuery plug-in for Grid, Table and scroll bar auto fill
Environment: Java, J2EE, JDK 1.6, JEE, JSP, JavaScript, Web Services, WSDL, SOA, SOAP, XML, XSD, XSL, XSLT, jQuery, JDBC, JUnit 4.0, Oracle 10G, Eclipse, Agile, Maven v2.2.1, Log4J v1.2.x, Solaris 2.5.10, SMTP, HTML, UML, Microsoft Visio, HP Quality Center.

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Developer
Lead/Application Developer
Developer
Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Project: KOM++ (Commission Maintenance System) Role: Developer
Description : KOM++ is a product developed for the Sanlam to calculate the commissions for the intermediaries who deals with the policy holders. The system will calculate the commissions to be issued during Policy Creation, Policy Termination and various events associated with Policy
Responsibilities: * Processing of Commissions to Intermediaries based on commissionable events. ; * Scheduling of commission payments. * Creation of Commission Payment Entries. * Online Enquires and Manual Adjustments. * Online screens to correct any error events. * Screens for Reports Generation. ; * Batch Programs for projecting the future payments
Environment: J2EE, WebSphere 6.0, DB2 8.0, Windows, MasterCraft 7.0, Eclipse.

Competency.name: development of index file generator and search index algorithms
Masters Degree > Master of Business Administration > Master of Business Administration Human Resource Management

CompetencyEvidence.name: Alias
CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: Master of Business Administration in Human Resource Management

Competency.name: Bachelors Degree > Bachelor of Computer Sciences

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 9 years. Currently this candidate is employed at Western Union. This candidate has extensive knowledge of XML, Web Services, Java, UML/OMT, Java Server Pages, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, JDBC, XML Schema, jQuery, Microsoft Visio, JUnit, ECLiPSe, WSDL, Struts Web Application Framework, Spring Framework, Service Oriented Architecture, SOAP, MVC, JavaScript, HTML, DB2, XSL, Oracle 10G, Oracle, Java Enterprise Edition, JDK, IBM WebSphere, Hibernate, HP Quality Center 10.0, Apache Maven, UNIX, SMTP, Rapid Application Development RAD, Log4j, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, HTTP, EDW, CVS, Agile, AJAX, iBATIS, XSLT, Sun Solaris, Stored Procedures, Oracle Applications, MS Visual SourceSafe, Linux, Java 2, Enterprise Java Beans, Class Diagrams, Cascading Style Sheets, Apache Subversion, XPath, WebSphere MQ, Unix Scripts, TOAD, Spring Security 2.0.4, SQL, RSA, Oracle 8, MasterCraft 7.0, IntelliJ IDEA, Birt Viewer, Ant. This candidate has some experience in managment (22 months).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2010-09 for 10 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Lead/Application Developer at Bloomberg. Since 2008-05 for 12 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Lead/Application Developer at Toys R Us.
